name: Rancrisp Cassava Chip Pepper & Sea Salt
description: Rancrisp cassava chips are lightly salted and peppered, crispy to the bite and taste light on your palate giving you a treatment of the day to complement your lunch or as a late afternoon snack. Rancrisp Salt and pepper cassava chips give you the kick to make it through your day. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
